HeroSection.title: Expert Care for Your Vehicle
HeroSection.subtitle: At Aguilauto, we offer high-quality mechanical services to keep your car running smoothly and reliably. Trust our certified mechanics for your automotive needs.
HeroSection.backgroundImageAlt: Mechanic working on a car in Aguilauto workshop

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions for all your vehicle's needs.

oil_change.title: Oil Change
oil_change.description: Regular oil and filter changes to keep your engine healthy.

brake_services.title: Brake Services
brake_services.description: Complete brake inspection, repair, and replacement.

engine_diagnostics.title: Engine Diagnostics
engine_diagnostics.description: Advanced diagnostics to identify and fix engine problems.

used_cars.title: Used Cars
used_cars.description: Find quality pre-owned vehicles you can trust.

Footer.tagline: Built with care for your automotive needs.

LoginForm.title: Client Login
LoginForm.description: Access your vehicle information and invoices.
LoginForm.registerDescription: Sign up to manage your vehicles and services.
LoginForm.switchToRegister: Don't have an account? Create one
LoginForm.switchToLogin: Already have an account? Sign In

ResetPasswordDialog.title: Reset Password
ResetPasswordDialog.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ResetPasswordDialog.successDescription: If an account exists for {email}, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
ResetPasswordDialog.errorDescription: Could not send password reset link: {error}. Please try again.

signInMessages.errorInvalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
signInMessages.errorAccountInactive: Your account is currently inactive. A manager will review and activate your account shortly. Please try again later or contact support.
signInMessages.googleErrorDescription: Could not sign in with Google: {error}

registerMessages.successDescription: Account created successfully. A manager will review and activate your account shortly. You will be notified upon activation.
registerMessages.errorEmailExists: This email address is already in use. Try logging in.
registerMessages.errorWeakPassword: Password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters.
registerMessages.errorMissingName: First name and last name are required.

LoginForm.firstNameRequiredError: First name must be at least 2 characters.
LoginForm.lastNameRequiredError: Last name must be at least 2 characters.
LoginForm.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least {minLength} characters.

signInMessages.errorNotAuthorized: You are not authorized to access the manager portal.
signInMessages.errorClientDocNotFound: Manager account details not found in database. Contact admin.
signInMessages.errorNotManagerRole: This account does not have manager privileges.

ClientDashboardPage.title: Your Vehicles
ClientDashboardPage.description: Manage your vehicles, view maintenance schedules, and access invoices.
ClientDashboardPage.noVehicles: You currently have no vehicles registered.
ClientDashboardPage.noVehiclesContact: Contact us to add your vehicle to the portal.
ClientDashboardPage.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Please log in to view your dashboard.

ClientProfilePage.pageDescription: View and update your personal information and preferences.
ClientProfilePage.errorNotFound: Your profile data could not be found. Please contact support if this issue persists.
ClientProfilePage.errorFetching: An error occurred while loading your profile. Please try again later.
ClientProfilePage.notLoggedInMessage: You must be logged in to view your profile. Please log in.

EditForm.error_invalidDniFormat: Invalid DNI format. Expected 8 digits and a letter.
EditForm.error_invalidNieFormat: Invalid NIE format. Expected X, Y, or Z, 7 digits, and a letter.
EditForm.error_invalidNifFormat: Invalid NIF format. Expected DNI format or company NIF format.
EditForm.error_invalidPassportFormat: Invalid Passport format. Expected at least 5 alphanumeric characters.
EditForm.toastSuccessDescription: Your profile information has been successfully updated.
EditForm.toastErrorMissingId: Client ID is missing. Cannot update profile.

ImageUpload.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your current profile image? This action cannot be undone.
ImageUpload.deleteSuccessDescription: Your profile image has been successfully removed.
ImageUpload.uploadSuccessDescription: Your new profile image has been successfully uploaded.

ManagerDashboardPage.title: Vehicle Fleet Management
ManagerDashboardPage.description: Oversee all client vehicles, manage records, and schedule maintenance.
ManagerDashboardPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by License Plate, Client Email/DNI, Name, Make, Model, VIN...
ManagerDashboardPage.noVehiclesFoundDB: No vehicles found in the database.
ManagerDashboardPage.noVehiclesFoundCriteria: No vehicles found matching your criteria.
ManagerDashboardPage.considerAddingVehicles: Consider adding some vehicles to your Firestore 'vehicles' collection.
ManagerDashboardPage.toastErrorDescription: Could not load vehicles and clients from the database.

AddVehicleForm.dialogDescription: Enter the details for the new vehicle. Click add when you're done.

ClientVehicleDetailPage.vehicleNotFoundDescription: The vehicle you are looking for does not exist or you do not have permission to view it.
ClientVehicleDetailPage.errorFetching: An error occurred while trying to load vehicle details. Please try again later.
ClientVehicleDetailPage.unauthorizedAccessMessage: You do not have permission to view this vehicle.
ClientVehicleDetailPage.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Please log in to view this page.

ManagerVehicleDetailPage.errorLoadingInvoices: Could not load invoices. Please try again.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.errorLoadingMaintenance: Could not load maintenance schedule. Please try again.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.errorLoadingVehicle: Could not load vehicle details. Please try again.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.vehicleNotFoundDescription: The vehicle you are looking for does not exist.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.editVehicleDetailsDescription: Update the information for this vehicle.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.confirmDeleteVehicleDescription: Are you sure you want to delete vehicle {make} {model} ({licensePlate})? This action cannot be undone and will also attempt to delete its associated image. Invoices and maintenance records will NOT be deleted.
ManagerVehicleDetailPage.toastDeleteImageErrorDuringVehicleDelete: Could not delete the vehicle's image from storage, but the vehicle record was deleted. Error: {error}

EditVehicleFormDialogs.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the current vehicle image? This action cannot be undone.
EditVehicleFormDialogs.deleteSuccessDescription: The vehicle image has been successfully removed.
EditVehicleFormDialogs.uploadSuccessDescription: The new vehicle image has been successfully uploaded.

InvoiceList.title: Invoice History
InvoiceList.description: Access and download your past service invoices.
InvoiceList.noInvoices: No invoices found for this vehicle.

MaintenanceSchedule.title: Maintenance Schedule
MaintenanceSchedule.description: Upcoming and due services for your vehicle.
MaintenanceSchedule.noUpcomingItems: No upcoming maintenance items. Your vehicle is up to date!
MaintenanceSchedule.appointmentMessageDefault: I'd like to schedule an appointment for my vehicle's maintenance: {vehicle}.

InvoiceManagementSection.title: Invoice History
InvoiceManagementSection.description: Manage and add service invoices for this vehicle.
InvoiceManagementSection.notifyClientWhatsAppAriaLabel: Notify client about invoice {invoiceNumber} via WhatsApp
InvoiceManagementSection.whatsappNotificationMessage: Hello, your invoice {invoiceNumber} from Aguilauto for the amount of {totalAmount} is now available.
InvoiceManagementSection.whatsappClientPhoneNotFound: Client phone number not found for this invoice.
InvoiceManagementSection.whatsappClientNotFound: Could not find the client associated with this invoice.
InvoiceManagementSection.noInvoices: No invoices found for this vehicle.
InvoiceManagementSection.toastErrorDescription: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
InvoiceManagementSection.toastErrorLoadingCatalog: Could not load service catalog. Please try adding services manually or try again later.
InvoiceManagementSection.toastErrorDescriptionSaving: Could not save invoice to database:
InvoiceManagementSection.formNoServicesInCatalog: No services in catalog. Add manually.

ManageInvoiceForm.dialogDescription: Enter the details for the invoice. Click save when you're done.
ManageInvoiceForm.formNotesPlaceholder: Enter any notes for this invoice...
ManageInvoiceForm.formServiceDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Oil Change, Tire Rotation, or from catalog
ManageInvoiceForm.toastUploadingPDFDescription: Please wait while the invoice PDF is being uploaded.
ManageInvoiceForm.toastUploadPDFSuccessDescription: The invoice PDF has been successfully uploaded.
ManageInvoiceForm.toastUploadPDFErrorDescription: Could not upload the PDF. The invoice will be saved/updated without it, or with the previous PDF if editing.
ManageInvoiceForm.toastOldPDFDeletedDescription: The old PDF for this invoice has been removed.

ConfirmDeleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
ConfirmDeleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete this invoice? This action cannot be undone, and the associated PDF will also be deleted.

InvoiceManagementSection.toastDeletePDFSuccessDescription: The associated PDF has been deleted from storage.
InvoiceManagementSection.toastDeletePDFErrorDescription: Could not delete the PDF from storage, but the invoice data will be deleted. Manual cleanup of the PDF might be needed.
InvoiceManagementSection.toastDeleteInvoiceSuccessDescription: The invoice has been successfully deleted.

MaintenanceManagementSection.title: Maintenance Schedule Management
MaintenanceManagementSection.description: Manage and add maintenance items for this vehicle.

MaintenanceManagementSection.formNoTasksInCatalog: No tasks in catalog. Add manually.
MaintenanceManagementSection.noItems: No maintenance items scheduled for this vehicle.
MaintenanceManagementSection.toastErrorDescription: Description and at least one task are required.
MaintenanceManagementSection.toastErrorLoadingCatalog: Could not load service catalog for tasks. Please try again later.
MaintenanceManagementSection.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete maintenance item "{description}"? This action cannot be undone.
